title: Pixel 4 xl My screen does not go off when taking calls when I place it on my face.
content:
I have tried every thing. Rebooted my phone to original settings and still have the same issue. 

When taking calls my phone screen stays on and when I place my phone on my ear my phone goes haywire and does what it wants according to my ears preference. 

No I do not have a screen protector on the proximity sensor.
